titles.title: How Great Is Our God! How Great Is His Sonshine!

verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
How great is our God!
How great is His Sonshine.
I'll give Him my heart.
He'll give me His Sonshine.
He's taken me out of the darkness of sin,
And given me Sonlight within.
He's changing this heart of mine.
How great is our God!
